trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_000<tab>If you're planning to hold a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding here at the Sanctum, I can furnish you with assorted items to make your special day as special as can be!

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the online store.
TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_CEREMONYSHOP01578_000_020<tab>You and your beloved were joined here at the Sanctum, were you not? I wish you all the best in your future together!

TEXT_REGFSTETERNALCEREMONYSHOP_00219_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The wares on offer are available only to those currently undertaking the quest “The Ties that Bind,” and who have yet to hold their ceremony. To accept this quest, you must possess a promise wristlet, which can be acquired via the online store.
